mapper.sql: CARD_NO, CVV_DATE, VALID_DATE, SVC_CODE, CVV2_ERR_TIMES, CARD_STAT, ACT_DATE, LOCK_STAT, CANCEL_STAT, LOST_STAT, QUERY_PIN, TXN_PIN, PIN_STAT, NOPIN_TXN_AMT, PIN_ERR_TIMES, PRODUCT_ID, CARDHOLDER_ID, ISSUER_ID, ISSUE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, CHANGE_STAT, ORG_CARD_NO, NEW_CARD_NO, RSVD1, RSVD2, RECHARGE_NUM, CONSUM_NUM, LOCK_DATE, FREEZE_STAT, SHORT_MSG_INFM_IN, EMAIL_INFM_IN, RECLAIM
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from SVC_MNG.TB_ACC_CARD_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SVC_MNG.TB_ACC_CARD_INFO (CARD_NO, CVV_DATE, VALID_DATE, SVC_CODE, CVV2_ERR_TIMES, CARD_STAT, ACT_DATE, LOCK_STAT, CANCEL_STAT, LOST_STAT, QUERY_PIN, TXN_PIN, PIN_STAT, NOPIN_TXN_AMT, PIN_ERR_TIMES, PRODUCT_ID, CARDHOLDER_ID, ISSUER_ID, ISSUE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, CHANGE_STAT, ORG_CARD_NO, NEW_CARD_NO, RSVD1, RSVD2, RECHARGE_NUM, CONSUM_NUM, LOCK_DATE, FREEZE_STAT, SHORT_MSG_INFM_IN, EMAIL_INFM_IN, RECLAIM) values (#{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cvvDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{validDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{svcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cvv2ErrTimes,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cardStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{actDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lockStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cancelStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lostStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{queryPin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnPin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pinStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nopinTxnAmt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pinErrTimes,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardholderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issuerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{changeStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orgCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsvd1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsvd2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{consumNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lockDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{freezeStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{shortMsgInfmIn,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{emailInfmIn,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{reclaim,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update SVC_MNG.TB_ACC_CARD_INFO
CARD_NO = #{record.cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CVV_DATE = #{record.cvvDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
VALID_DATE = #{record.validDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
SVC_CODE = #{record.svcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CVV2_ERR_TIMES = #{record.cvv2ErrTimes,jdbcType=CHAR},
CARD_STAT = #{record.cardStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
ACT_DATE = #{record.actDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
LOCK_STAT = #{record.lockStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
CANCEL_STAT = #{record.cancelStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
LOST_STAT = #{record.lostStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUERY_PIN = #{record.queryPin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_PIN = #{record.txnPin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIN_STAT = #{record.pinStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
NOPIN_TXN_AMT = #{record.nopinTxnAmt,jdbcType=CHAR},
PIN_ERR_TIMES = #{record.pinErrTimes,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARDHOLDER_ID = #{record.cardholderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUER_ID = #{record.issuerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUE_DATE = #{record.issueDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHANGE_STAT = #{record.changeStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORG_CARD_NO = #{record.orgCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_CARD_NO = #{record.newCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSVD1 = #{record.rsvd1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSVD2 = #{record.rsvd2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECHARGE_NUM = #{record.rechargeNum,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONSUM_NUM = #{record.consumNum,jdbcType=CHAR},
LOCK_DATE = #{record.lockDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
FREEZE_STAT = #{record.freezeStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
SHORT_MSG_INFM_IN = #{record.shortMsgInfmIn,jdbcType=CHAR},
EMAIL_INFM_IN = #{record.emailInfmIn,jdbcType=CHAR},
RECLAIM = #{record.reclaim,jdbcType=CHAR},

update SVC_MNG.TB_ACC_CARD_INFO set CARD_NO = #{record.cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CVV_DATE = #{record.cvvDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, VALID_DATE = #{record.validDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, SVC_CODE = #{record.svcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CVV2_ERR_TIMES = #{record.cvv2ErrTimes,jdbcType=CHAR}, CARD_STAT = #{record.cardStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, ACT_DATE = #{record.actDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOCK_STAT = #{record.lockStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, CANCEL_STAT = #{record.cancelStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOST_STAT = #{record.lostStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUERY_PIN = #{record.queryPin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_PIN = #{record.txnPin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIN_STAT = #{record.pinStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, NOPIN_TXN_AMT = #{record.nopinTxnAmt,jdbcType=CHAR}, PIN_ERR_TIMES = #{record.pinErrTimes,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARDHOLDER_ID = #{record.cardholderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUER_ID = #{record.issuerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUE_DATE = #{record.issueDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHANGE_STAT = #{record.changeStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORG_CARD_NO = #{record.orgCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_CARD_NO = #{record.newCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RSVD1 = #{record.rsvd1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RSVD2 = #{record.rsvd2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECHARGE_NUM = #{record.rechargeNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONSUM_NUM = #{record.consumNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOCK_DATE = #{record.lockDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, FREEZE_STAT = #{record.freezeStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, SHORT_MSG_INFM_IN = #{record.shortMsgInfmIn,jdbcType=CHAR}, EMAIL_INFM_IN = #{record.emailInfmIn,jdbcType=CHAR}, RECLAIM = #{record.reclaim,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ENTITY_ID,FATHER_ENTITY_ID,CUSTOMER_NAME,CUSTOMER_ADDRESS from TB_CUSTOMER where ENTITY_ID=(select ENTITY_ID from TB_CARDHOLDER where CARDHOLDER_ID=(select CARDHOLDER_ID from TB_ACC_CARD_INFO where CARD_NO=#{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
